title: Inside the Parker - Make July 4th Opening Day Happen; RIP Bob Watson; Bregmann Weak for Firing LeBron's Klutch; Red Sox Preview
itunes:title: Inside the Parker - Make July 4th Opening Day Happen; RIP Bob Watson; Bregmann Weak for Firing LeBron's Klutch; Red Sox Preview
description:
This week on Inside the (Rob) Parker, Rob looks at the hope for an MLB season, why a 4th of July opening day would be perfect, why Alex Bregmann firing LeBron's Klutch Sports group over an Astros Documentary expose is weak, and remembers former MLB player and exec Bob Watson. Red Sox beat writer Julian McWilliams joins the pod to preview what Boston might look like in a pandemic shortened season. Click here to subscribe and download all of the latest Inside the Parker podcasts!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
